banner.parrafo1: The Digital Library of the Academia de Humanismo Cristiano University, collects, preserves and distributes the academic, investigative and patrimonial material in digital format, generated and published by the different Academic Units of the Institution. This repository was started in 2005 with the objective of storing and promoting the degree work of the undergraduate and postgraduate programs, as well as the different publications of the University.
